descriptionMdByRank.1: When the Resonator takes no damage, increases ATK by **6%** every 5s, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s. When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1 and restores their HP by **5%**.
descriptionMdByRank.2: When the Resonator takes no damage, increases ATK by **7.5%** every 5s, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s. When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1 and restores their HP by **6.25%**.
descriptionMdByRank.3: When the Resonator takes no damage, increases ATK by **9%** every 5s, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s. When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1 and restores their HP by **7.5%**.
descriptionMdByRank.4: When the Resonator takes no damage, increases ATK by **10.5%** every 5s, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s. When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1 and restores their HP by **8.75%**.
descriptionMdByRank.5: When the Resonator takes no damage, increases ATK by **12%** every 5s, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s. When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1 and restores their HP by **10%**.
